abstract: The announcement is the latest takeover defeat for Carl C. Icahn, who also failed to win the likes of Clorox in the last year.
snippet: The announcement is the latest takeover defeat for Carl C. Icahn, who also failed to win the likes of Clorox in the last year.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn struck out in his effort to buy the Commercial Metals Company, announcing on Wednesday that he was withdrawing his $1.7 billion bid to take over the metal recycler.

headline.main: Icahn Drops Bid for Commercial Metals

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
